PageTitle: display multicast ipv6 global outgoing-interface pim sm statistics
FuncDef: The display multicast ipv6 global outgoing-interface pim sm statistics command displays statistics about outgoing interfaces of IPv6 PIM SM entries exceeds the upper limit.
CLIs: display multicast ipv6 global outgoing-interface pim sm statistics
Examples: <HUAWEI> display multicast ipv6 global outgoing-interface pim sm statistics
Total number of outgoing interfaces in (*, G) entries: 100
Total number of outgoing interfaces in (S, G) entries: 100
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You can run this command to check whether the total number of outgoing interfaces in IPv6 PIM-SM entries exceeds the upper limit.
